mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment ( post_id, user_id, parent_id, content, create_time ) VALUES ( #{postId}, #{userId}, #{parentId}, #{content}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.post_id, c.user_id, c.parent_id, c.content, c.like_count, c.create_time as createdAt, u.nickname as userName, u.avatar as userAvatar FROM comment c LEFT JOIN user u ON c.user_id = u.id WHERE c.post_id = #{postId} ORDER BY c.create_time ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM comment WHERE post_id = #{postId}
